-------------------------------------------------
P L O T
-------------------------------------------------
Fearful of meeting a gruesome death, young Jake 
(Matthew Knight) tries to convince his psychiatrist 
(Shawnee Smith) that an evil curse led to the 
slaughter of his entire family. Meanwhile, a young 
woman from Japan (Emi Ikehata) arrives in Chicago 
and attempts to stop the curse for good. This 
third installment of the popular Grudge horror 
movie series also stars Marina Sirtis, Beau 
Mirchoff and Johanna E. Braddy. 

Starring: Shawnee Smith, Marina Sirtis

Director: Toby Wilkins
